copy.subtitle: A comfortable, adjustable ergonomic chair designed for hours of productive work without discomfort.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This chair's ergonomic support allows you to stay focused on your work for longer periods without the distraction of back pain.
copy.target_audience: Professionals who spend long hours at a desk and experience discomfort or fatigue.
copy.pain_point: Back pain and discomfort from a bad chair kill your focus and limit how long you can work effectively.
copy.solution: Our ergonomic chair provides adjustable support for your body, eliminating pain and enabling longer, more productive work sessions.
